text: Nerf N-Strike is an video game that was made by Electronic Arts. Nerf N-Strike for the Wii from IGN It is part of the Nerf series. It was released on the Wii and Nintendo DS.Nerf N-Strike for the Nintendo DS from IGN The game was released in North America on October 28, 2008. ==History== In August 2007, Electronic Arts gained the rights to some Hasbro brands, like Monopoly, Littlest Pet Shop, and Nerf. In February, EA Casual Entertainment announced that their EA Salt Lake Studio would develop and release video games for Littlest Pet Shop and Nerf N-Strike.Sinclair, Brandon. "EA details plans for Hasbro brands". GameSpot. February 11, 2008. title: Nerf N-Strike
